de.charite.compbio.jannovar.reference

Class TranscriptProjectionDecorator

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.charite.compbio.jannovar.reference.TranscriptProjectionDecorator

  • public final class TranscriptProjectionDecorator
extends Object
    Wraps a TranscriptModel object and allow the coordinate conversion.
    Author:
    Manuel Holtgrewe

      • genomeToTranscriptPos

        public TranscriptPosition genomeToTranscriptPos(GenomePosition pos)
                                         throws ProjectionException
        Coordinate conversion from genome position to transcript position.
        Parameters:
        pos - genome position to convert
        Returns:
        position on transcript corresponding to pos
        Throws:
        ProjectionException - if the genome position was not valid

      • genomeToCDSPos

        public CDSPosition genomeToCDSPos(GenomePosition pos)
                           throws ProjectionException
        Coordinate conversion from genome position to CDS position. This is computed from the transcript position and the offset of the CDS start position.
        Parameters:
        pos - genome position to convert
        Returns:
        position on transcript corresponding to pos
        Throws:
        ProjectionException - if the genome position was not valid

      • cdsToTranscriptPos

        public TranscriptPosition cdsToTranscriptPos(CDSPosition pos)
        Coordinate conversion from CDS to transcript position.
        Parameters:
        pos - the position in the CDS transcript
        Returns:
        the corresponding genome position for pos, will be on the same strand as the transcript

      • cdsToGenomePos

        public GenomePosition cdsToGenomePos(CDSPosition pos)
                              throws ProjectionException
        Coordinate conversion from CDS to genome position.
        Parameters:
        pos - the position in the CDS transcript
        Returns:
        the corresponding genome position for pos, will be on the same strand as the transcript
        Throws:
        ProjectionException - on problems with the coordinate transformation (outside of the transcript)

      • transcriptToGenomePos

        public GenomePosition transcriptToGenomePos(TranscriptPosition pos)
                                     throws ProjectionException
        Coordinate conversion from transcript to genome position.
        Parameters:
        pos - the position on the transcript
        Returns:
        the corresponding genome position for pos, will be on the same strand as the transcript
        Throws:
        ProjectionException - on problems with the coordinate transformation (outside of the transcript)

      • exonIDInReferenceOrder

        public int exonIDInReferenceOrder(int exonID)
        Returns the index of the (0-based) exon in the reference (forward) order.
        Parameters:
        exonID - the 0-based exonID in transcript order (reverse order in the case of transcripts on the reverse strand)
        Returns:
        the exon ID in reference (forward order)

      • locateIntron

        public int locateIntron(GenomePosition pos)
        Returns (0-based) index of the intron (in the order determined by the transcript's strand).
        Parameters:
        pos - the GenomePosition to use for querying
        Returns:
        (0-based) index of the selected intron, or INVALID_INTRON_ID if pos is not in exonic region but in transcript interval

      • locateExon

        public int locateExon(GenomePosition pos)
        Returns (0-based) index of the exon (in the order determined by the transcript's strand).
        Parameters:
        pos - the GenomePosition to use for querying
        Returns:
        (0-based) index of the selected exon, or INVALID_EXON_ID if pos is not in exonic region but in transcript interval

      • locateExon

        public int locateExon(TranscriptPosition pos)
               throws ProjectionException
        Returns (0-based) index of the exon (in the order determined by the transcript's strand).
        Parameters:
        pos - the TranscriptPosition to use for querying
        Returns:
        (0-based) index of the selected exon
        Throws:
        ProjectionException - if there was a problem with pos (somehow falls out of transcript region, can only happen if negative or right of transcript end)

      • projectGenomeToCDSPosition

        public CDSPosition projectGenomeToCDSPosition(GenomePosition pos)
        Translate GenomePosition to CDSPosition for transcript. Positions upstream of CDS region are projected to the CDS begin position, downstream of CDS are projected to the CDS end, positions in CDS introns are projected to first position of the next CDS exon.
        Parameters:
        pos - the position to translate
        Returns:
        the corresponding position in the transcript sequence

      • projectGenomeToCDSInterval

        public CDSInterval projectGenomeToCDSInterval(GenomeInterval interval)
        Translate GenomeInterval to CDSInterval for transcript. Positions upstream of CDS region are projected to the CDS begin position, downstream of CDS are projected to the CDS end.
        Parameters:
        interval - the GenomeInterval to project
        Returns:
        the corresponding position in the transcript sequence

      • projectGenomeToTXPosition

        public TranscriptPosition projectGenomeToTXPosition(GenomePosition pos)
        Translate GenomePosition to TranscriptPosition for transcript. Positions upstream of TX region are projected to the TX begin position, downstream of TX are projected to the TX end, positions in introns are projected to first position of the next CDS exon.
        Parameters:
        pos - the position to translate
        Returns:
        the corresponding position in the transcript sequence

      • projectGenomeToTXInterval

        public TranscriptInterval projectGenomeToTXInterval(GenomeInterval interval)
        Translate GenomeInterval to TranscriptInterval for transcript. Positions upstream of TX region are projected to the TX begin position, downstream of TX are projected to the TX end.
        Parameters:
        interval - the GenomeInterval to project
        Returns:
        the corresponding position in the transcript sequence
